title: DJ Sessions: Hawaiian Sounds, From Jesse Kalima To Nohelani Cypriano
teaser: Colett Welch, host of "Ho'onanea" on KKCR community radio in Hanalei, Hawaii, shares some of her favorite Hawaiian music.
contentencoded:
For this edition of the Here & Now DJ Sessions, host Jeremy Hobson sits down with Colett Welch, host of “Ho’onanea” on KKCR community radio in Hanalei, Hawaii. She shares some of her favorite Hawaiian music, from a song by the late Jesse Kalima, to new music from Nohelani Cypriano.

  • See more DJ Sessions

Note: We have a Spotify playlist for our weekly DJ Sessions segment. The playlist is updated each week with new songs. Spotify is free to use, but requires a login.

Songs In This Segment

  • Kahauanu Lake Trio, “Pua Lililehua”
  • Jesse Kalima, “Kila Kila O Moanalua”
  • Neal Yamamura, “Waikīkī”
  • Nohelani Cypriano, “Nani Kaua’i”

[Youtube]

Guest

  • Colett Welch, host of “Ho’onanea” on KKCR community radio in Hanalei, Hawaii.
